title: Borders
body:
I did the bronze dream: climb out of silver
Do i need to play a certain amount of games to get my silver border?

replies.body:
As long as you end the season at Silver, you'll be getting all of those Silver rewards. Getting Silver in another queue will get you the Victorious Ward Skin too!

Silver: Summoner Icon, profile insignia, Victorious ward skin (2+ queues)1, and loading screen border (queue specific)
